vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Elam = "eternity"
n pr loc
a province east of Babylon and northeast of the lower Tigris
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Sem; (b)   territorio entre Mesopotamia y Persia; (c)   hijo de Sasac; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Meselemías; portero; tribu de Leví; (e)   jefes de familia; post exílico; (f)   sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以攔 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 「永生」
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 大衛王時代, 可拉族的利未人
2) 便雅憫支派的首領
3) 某家族的祖先, 其子孫流亡在外, 後來同著所羅巴伯回歸本地
( 拉 2:1-3,7; 尼 7:12)
4) 首領名, 率領百姓跟尼希米立約 ( 尼 9:38-10:14)
5) 另一個家族的祖先, 其子孫流亡在外, 後來同著所羅巴伯回歸本地
( 拉 2:31; 尼 7:34)
6) 尼希米時代, 耶路撒冷城牆行告成典禮的時候, 在旁協助的祭司
( 尼 12:27-32,41-42)
7) 回歸的流亡猶太人當中, 某家族的另一個首領
專有名詞 地名
8) 省名, 位於巴比倫的東方, 底格里斯河下游流域的東北方
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以拦 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 「永生」
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 大卫王时代, 可拉族的利未人
2) 便雅悯支派的首领
3) 某家族的祖先, 其子孙流亡在外, 后来同着所罗巴伯回归本地
( 拉 2:1-3,7; 尼 7:12)
4) 首领名, 率领百姓跟尼希米立约 ( 尼 9:38-10:14)
5) 另一个家族的祖先, 其子孙流亡在外, 后来同着所罗巴伯回归本地
( 拉 2:31; 尼 7:34)
6) 尼希米时代, 耶路撒冷城墙行告成典礼的时候, 在旁协助的祭司
( 尼 12:27-32,41-42)
7) 回归的流亡犹太人当中, 某家族的另一个首领
专有名词 地名
8) 省名, 位于巴比伦的东方, 底格里斯河下游流域的东北方

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.7
§ Elam = "eternity"
n pr m
1) a Korhite Levite in the time of David
2) a chief man of the tribe of Benjamin
3) ancestor of a family of exiles who returned with Zerubbabel
4) a chief of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
5) another ancestor of another family of exiles who returned with Zerubbabel
6) a priest who assisted at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
7) another head of a family of returning exiles

A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.22;
son of: Shem (H8035);
brother of: Asshur (H0804H), Arpachshad (H0775), Lud (H3865) and Aram (H0758)
§ Elam = "eternity"
n pr m
Male living at the time of the first Patriarchs (Gen.10.22; 1Ch.1.17)

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.24;
son of: Shashak (H8349);
brother of: Ishpan (H3473), Eber (H5677J), Eliel (H0447I), Abdon (H5658I), Zichri (H2147I), Hanan (H2605), Hananiah (H2608O), Anthothijah (H6070), Iphdeiah (H3301) and Penuel (H6439I)
§ Elam = "eternity"
n pr m
Male living at the time of the first Patriarchs (Gen.10.22; 1Ch.1.17)

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.3;
son of: Meshelemiah (H4920);
brother of: Zechariah (H2148A), Jediael (H3043J), Zebadiah (H2069J), Jathniel (H3496), Jehohanan (H3076I) and Eliehoenai (H0454A)
§ Elam = "eternity"
n pr m
Male living at the time of the first Patriarchs (Gen.10.22; 1Ch.1.17)

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.14
